CustomField.description: Enter the API name of a global class which contains two global properties: `record` and `recordPrior. Both of these variables need to match the SObject type for this SObject Trigger Setting record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of a global class which contains two global properties: `record` and `recordPrior. Both of these variables need to match the SObject type for this SObject Trigger Setting record.
CustomField.label: Formula Evaluation Class Name
